title: [Bug]: Window resizing is broken on latest update
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No. It works perfect in various browsers and PWAs.

### Describe the bug

Starts up in a very small window. Resizing doesn't properly work. Can't maximize it either.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Just try to resize or maximize it
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
To work like earlier versions
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

This is my Distro and Specs:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a1b1b940-f81a-488d-bf46-99fee1f75324)


And this is the app when maximized:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7ac54e04-f582-49e0-9793-57f7abc28768)

Look at the small app window top left. I can't resize it either by dragging on the sides. Doesn't work. The app is just broken now.
